Welcome to Regression with Summary Statistics (RSS) wiki!

This wiki hosts the following documentation pages of RSS software.
If you have any question or suggestion about RSS,
please feel free to create a new [issue](https://github.com/stephenslab/rss/issues)
and/or send an email to `xiangzhu[at]uchicago[and/or]stanford.edu`.

## <img src="https://static.thenounproject.com/png/2218944-200.png" width="48"/> [Installation](setup.html)

This page provides instructions for installing RSS software.

## <img src="https://static.thenounproject.com/png/2342347-200.png" width="48"/> [Functions](function.html) 

This page outlines functions and scripts associated with RSS methods.

## <img src="https://static.thenounproject.com/png/2019098-200.png" width="48"/> [Examples](example.html)

This page gives end-to-end examples of using RSS methods and software.

## <img src="https://static.thenounproject.com/png/3408080-200.png" width="48"/> [FAQs](faq.html)

This page answers frequently ask questions (FAQs) about RSS methods and software.

## <img src="https://static.thenounproject.com/png/689848-200.png" width="48"/> [News](news.html)

This page lists progress updates related to RSS methods and software.
